b2ce1891-5b7d-4aa6-9ef9-0e65eec1fb86.full_summary:
# Summary Generation Failed

Unable to generate AI summary at this time.

**Possible reasons:**
- API quota exceeded (wait a few minutes)
- Model unavailable
- Network issues
- Invalid API key

**What you can do:**
1. Wait a minute and try again
2. Check your API key and quota
3. Try uploading a smaller policy file

Visit: https://www.perplexity.ai/settings/api to check your API usage

a746c0e9-2968-4cbf-bdd1-4205ed1816a4.short_summary: üö´ Pluralsight shares personal data with subprocessors/third parties on instructions; international transfers (EU-US Framework). ‚ö†Ô∏è Uses cookies; AI processes user content; limited user deletion rights. Data encrypted, least-privilege access.[1][2][7][9] (38 words)
a746c0e9-2968-4cbf-bdd1-4205ed1816a4.full_summary:
# What You Need to Know

## üö´ CRITICAL ISSUES (Deal Breakers)
üö´ If your boss pays for your account with a work email, they own all your learning data like course history and scores - you lose access if they cut you off  
üö´ They record and store your support calls for 6 months, listening to everything you say  
üö´ Using a work email lets your employer take full control of your account and see everything in it  

## ‚ö†Ô∏è CONCERNING PRACTICES (Think Twice)
‚ö†Ô∏è They track every click, course view, scroll, and device detail automatically when you use the site  
‚ö†Ô∏è Your data gets shared with partners, affiliates, tech vendors, and even Facebook for ads and analytics  
‚ö†Ô∏è Data moves to the US from anywhere (like Europe) and they use legal tricks to make it "safe"  
‚ö†Ô∏è AI features can make up fake info or risky advice - don't trust it for real work  
‚ö†Ô∏è They keep your data forever after you quit, for lawsuits or complaints  
‚ö†Ô∏è Cookies follow you around other sites for targeted ads unless you opt out  

## ‚úÖ GOOD THINGS (Your Rights)
‚úÖ You can delete all your personal data anytime through account settings - it's gone for good  
‚úÖ Opt out of marketing emails and some ad tracking via your profile or unsubscribe link  
‚úÖ EU/UK users get full GDPR rights like seeing, fixing, or erasing your data  
‚úÖ California users have CCPA rights to know and control data sales  
‚úÖ They encrypt payments and call recordings, with limited staff access  

## ‚ÑπÔ∏è STANDARD STUFF (Normal for Most Services)
‚ÑπÔ∏è Need name and email to sign up; payment info for subscriptions  
‚ÑπÔ∏è They send service updates and can't be opted out of those  
‚ÑπÔ∏è Cookies run the site - disable them and features break  
‚ÑπÔ∏è Third-party payment processors handle your card details, not them  
‚ÑπÔ∏è They use your data to suggest courses and improve the site

06f9eff8-52c9-460b-a756-118df0c3c02b.short_summary: üö´ OpenAI collects **prompts, files, IP, device data**; shares with affiliates/sub-processors. ‚ö†Ô∏è May retain 30 days for safety/abuse; uses de-identified data for improvements. No training on business data unless opted in. Users have access/delete rights.[2][1][5] (38 words)
06f9eff8-52c9-460b-a756-118df0c3c02b.full_summary:
# What You Need to Know

## üö´ CRITICAL ISSUES (Deal Breakers)
üö´ They keep your chats, prompts, files, images, and audio to train their AI unless you opt out.
üö´ A court order forces them to save all ChatGPT conversations forever, even deleted or temporary ones from April-September 2025[1][2].
üö´ Bosses in business accounts can read your private chats and control your account.
üö´ They track your IP address, device info, location, and exact usage to watch for "fraud" or improve their stuff.
üö´ If the company sells or goes bankrupt, your data goes to the new owners.

## ‚ö†Ô∏è CONCERNING PRACTICES (Think Twice)
‚ö†Ô∏è They share your data with vendors, affiliates, and government if law says so or to fight "abuse."
‚ö†Ô∏è Your "deleted" temporary chats stick around 30 days for safety checks.
‚ö†Ô∏è AI outputs can lie about you or facts, and fixing model errors is hard.
‚ö†Ô∏è No jury trials‚Äîdisputes go to private arbitration in California, no class actions.
‚ö†Ô∏è Under 13 banned; under 18 needs parent okay, but they don't check age well.

## ‚úÖ GOOD THINGS (Your Rights)
‚úÖ You own your inputs and outputs, and they assign any rights to you.
‚úÖ Opt out of them using your content for AI training via settings.
‚úÖ Ask to see, delete, fix, or download your data at privacy.openai.com or dsar@openai.com.
‚úÖ They don't sell your data or use it for targeted ads.
‚úÖ Cancel paid account anytime, no refunds unless law requires.

## ‚ÑπÔ∏è STANDARD STUFF (Normal for Most Services)
‚ÑπÔ∏è Cookies track your browsing to run the site and remember logins.
‚ÑπÔ∏è Must be 13+ to sign up with real info; no sharing accounts.
‚ÑπÔ∏è They use data to fight spam, fix bugs, and send updates.
‚ÑπÔ∏è Security measures in place, but no online service is 100% hack-proof.
‚ÑπÔ∏è Policy can change with 30 days notice for big stuff.
